name: Summer Serve Copa
preparation:
This elevated take on the classic Gin & Tonic doubles down on flavor and freshness without complicating the recipe. It’s all the proof you need that Portobello Road gin pairs perfectly with tonic.

Fill a large red wine glass with ice and add the gin.

Slowly top with tonic water.

Slice off a thick peel of pink grapefruit and twist over the glass to release the oils from the skin, then place twist in the drink.

Sprinkle six to eight juniper berries on top.
